name: breeze-next
description: Next version of Breeze, built using TypeScript 2.

scripts.typedoc: typedoc --out ./temp/docs/ --exclude xx  --excludePrivate --excludeNotExported  --tsConfig ./tsconfig.typedoc.json --mode file --readme ./readme.doc.md ./src/breeze.ts && node rollup/copyIfDifferent.js temp/docs docs
scripts.rollup-full: npm run rollup -- -c ./rollup/rollup.full.js && npm run tsc-es5 -- --out build/breeze.debug.js temp/breeze.full.es2015.js && npm run minify -- --output build/breeze.min.js build/breeze.debug.js
scripts.rollup-base: npm run rollup -- -c ./rollup/rollup.base.js && npm run tsc-es5 -- --out build/breeze.base.debug.js temp/breeze.base.es2015.js && npm run minify -- --output build/breeze.base.min.js build/breeze.base.debug.js
scripts.rollup-adapters: npm run rollup-ajax-angular && npm run rollup-ajax-jquery && npm run rollup-data-odata && npm run rollup-data-webapi && npm run rollup-model-backing && npm run rollup-model-ko && npm run rollup-uri-json && npm run rollup-uri-odata
scripts.rollup-all: npm run rollup-full && npm run rollup-base && npm run rollup-adapters
